Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.pizzeria.pizzeria.entity.order

Class Order

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.pizzeria.pizzeria.entity.order.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderInformationService
public class Order extends Object implements OrderInformationService
Represents an order, created by PizzeriaImpl and used during the whole lifetime of the former.
